content: The Cold Iron Leaves is one of the basic materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cold_Iron_Leaves.md', within the main section titled 'Cold Iron Leaves'.
The content is as follows:
The Cold Iron Leaves is one of the basic materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game.
